short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify and monitor enterprise password leaks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shield your enterprise from phishing threats with PhishJail, an efficient and user-friendly browser extension. 

Here are the key features:
· Phishing Detection: Stay ahead of phishing attempts with continuous monitoring and alerts for reused enterprise password.
· Secure Hashing: Utilize Argon2 secure hashing protocol to maintain the integrity of your passwords.
· Instant Alerts: Receive real-time alerts if password reuse is detected to prevent breaches.
· Privacy-Focused: Your password safety and privacy is our priority; no unnecessary information leaves your device.
· Device Identification: Ensure only authorized devices have access with OPSWAT MetaDefender Access™.

PhishJail - The advance defense against phishing threats today!
